appDescription: An application to simulate a marketing meeting with AI-powered personas. Users can define AI characters, set a meeting topic, and watch as the AI team discusses the subject.
pageTitle: AI Marketing Meeting Room | Simulate AI Team Discussions
metaDescription: Use AI personas to simulate a marketing meeting. Define characters, set a topic, and get insights from an AI-powered discussion.

openGraph.title: AI Marketing Meeting Room
openGraph.description: Simulate strategic marketing meetings with an AI team and see what they come up with.
